entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 04:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle in the evening and after midnight. Periods of rain or snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
